upskill.text: Learn from expert authors with real-world experience in pen testing, malware analysis, security auditing, digital forensics and more
Accelerate skill development with personalized course recommendations that help employees skip over what they already know and focus on what they don’t
Align skill development to your most important objectives like automating threat responses or complying to regulatory standards

organizationComment.author: - Martin Schoenmakers
organizationComment.content: “We need partners like Pluralsight to make sure that we can adapt quickly to new technologies, understanding the needs of our people and to pick the right topic at the right time.“

organizationComment.author: - Justin Burger
organizationComment.position: Senior Director of Engineering, CDK Global
organizationComment.content: “We wouldn’t have been able to do what we did...without having tools like Pluralsight available to us. It’s been critical to the success of the company.“

organizationComment.author: - Heather Abbot
organizationComment.position: SVP of Corporate Solutions Technology, Nasdaq
organizationComment.content: “The biggest part of the digital transformation to me is acceleration. Pluralsight is a key part of how Nasdaq is trying to keep up and be ahead. We’re only as good as our teams are.”

organizationComment.author: - Bron McCall
organizationComment.content: “Pluralsight has given us a way to quickly provide very specific training to our team members. We can ensure that person is at the same level of knowledge for a specific technology.”

organizationComment.author: - Paul Smalera
organizationComment.content: “For the first time, you have total visibility into the strengths and weaknesses of your technical team, combined with the ability to do something about it.”
